successes.title: TGT (Tight) - A New Kind Of Wallet
successes.description: TGT wallets are constructed of premium, ultra-soft, vegetable tanned lambskin and custom designed elastic.  Order one at tightstore.com

Pledges.description: A huge thank you, a follow on twitter, and a shout out. Every dollar makes a difference!
A TGT 1.0 wallet of your choice, including shipping.
The options are Disco Easter, RPJ, Stone, Americana, Cowman, and Motor.
HOLIDAY SPECIAL
The 1.0 twins!  Disco Easter and RPJ are fraternal twins and they travel in pairs.
This reward will be delivered before the holidays.
The older brother twin 1.0s!  The Americana and Cowman are the rough and tumble set.
The RPJ 2.0 with a black leather pocket.  This wallet is 15mm shorter than the other styles, which means cards and cash are more visible, but also more accessible.
An Americana or Cowman TGT 2.0 (with an Italian leather pocket).  A limited number of Stone 2.0s are also available.
The Limited Edition RPJ 2.0 with an exclusive TGT ultra soft, black diamond leather.  After our limited supply runs out, this TGT will never be offered again.
The Limited Edition Stone 2.0 with an exclusive TGT ultra soft, black diamond leather. After our limited supply of this leather runs out, this TGT will never be offered again.
NEW REWARD LEVEL: One of each: the TGT 1.0 and the TGT 2.0 of your choice.
An Americana 2.0 plus the Disco Easter and RPJ 1.0 twins to start your collection.  This reward will ship before the holidays.

The first 125 backers who choose this reward will receive a very special bonus: the first TGT ever made, a floral pattern elastic TGT 1.0 with a vintage feel, that is available only on kickstarter and will never be made again.
One Limited Edition TGT 2.0, and one TGT 1.0 of your choice.
Two 2.0s of your choice, shipping included.
Any two TGT 2.0s, including the Limited Edition models.
A holiday collection of six gift-wrapped TGT 1.0s, two of each of the RPJ, Disco Easter, and Americanas.  Start your collection and a friend's, or divide up the pack and use as stocking stuffers!

Membership to the 'TGT Club' for one year, which includes a new TGT sent to you every season to start your collection.   A total of four TGTs: two 2.0s, and two 1.0s, will be sent to you in the first year and you will be offered your choice of wallets.  The first will arrive in December 2012.  Membership is a great gift!
Four TGT 2.0s, with the option to choose up to two Limited Edition TGT 2.0.  The Stone option at this reward level will not be ready to ship before the holidays.
NEW REWARD LEVEL: Three 1.0s and Three 2.0s of your choice.
Gold membership status to the 'TGT Club'. A new TGT design will be sent to you every three months until you have received the entire collection.  Mailing will begin in December 2012.
